name: ragbot2026
description: RAG Chatbot with React + Node + PostgreSQL + OpenAI

scripts.reseed:quick: docker compose exec backend node dist/cli/seed.js && curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/v1/ingest -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @docs/sample.json && curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/v1/ingest -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @docs/additional_docs.json
scripts.test: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/v1/chat -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"message": "How do I create a campaign?", "user": {"tenant_id": "adhub"}}'
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
